articles.title: Cricket Australia criticised for management of Tim Paine's sexting incident - ABC News
articles.description: Former players question the governing body's management of the incident, which has led to Tim Paine stepping down as the Australian men's Test captain ahead of the Ashes series.
articles.content:
Cricket Australia (CA) has been criticised for its handling of the Tim Paine sexting scandal, with former players saying it highlights the organisation's poor cultural standards.

articles.title: FIFA confirms intercontinental playoffs for World Cup spots to be one-off matches at neutral venues - ABC News
articles.description: If Australia has to go in the intercontinental playoffs for the World Cup finals in Qatar, they won't be able to clinch a spot in front of home fans or a hostile away crowd, with FIFA saying playoffs will be one-off games at neutral venues.
articles.content:
FIFA has confirmed the World Cup 2022 inter-confederation qualifying playoffs will be played as one-off matches at neutral venues.

articles.title: Teen found not guilty on all charges in BLM protest shootings - Sky News Australia
articles.description: The American teenager who fatally shot two protesters and injured a third in 2020 has been found not guilty on all five charges related to the demonstration against racial injustice by police officers after pleading self-defence.
